1 (function($NS, $GLOBAL){
  2     
  3     var Class = $NS.Class,
  4 		implementsErr,
  5 		typeofObject = 'object',
  6 		typeofFunction = 'function',
  7 		utils = $NS.utils,
  8 		isObject = utils.isObject,
  9 		isString = utils.isString,
 10 		isFunction = utils.isFunction;
 11 
 12     /**
 13      * Function creates a function which wraps the real object
 14      * function and calls it with provided arguments
 15      * @function
 16      * @private
 17      * @param {Object} objectInstance
 18      * @param {String} key
 19      */
 20     function interfaceCallerFactory(objectInstance, key){
 21 		return function(){
 22 			return objectInstance[key].apply(objectInstance, arguments);
 23 		};
 24     }
 25     
 26     /**
 27      * Function binds the current interface functions to call
 28      * the target object class function which implement the interface
 29      * 
 30      * @function
 31      * @name py.Interface#bind
 32      * @param {Object} objectInstance - target object into which we bind the interface
 33      * @param {Object} interfaceDefinition - definition, which functions should be bound
 34      */
 35     function bind(objectInstance, interfaceDefinition){
 36         var key;
 37             
 38         for(key in interfaceDefinition){
 39             if(interfaceDefinition.hasOwnProperty(key)){
 40                 if(isFunction(objectInstance[key])){
 41                     this[key] = interfaceCallerFactory(objectInstance, key);
 42                 }else{
 43 					implementsErr = 'cannot bind ' + key + '() implementation is missing';
 44 					throw implementsErr;
 45                 }
 46             }
 47         }
 48     }
 49     
 50     /**
 51      * Base Interface object creator. It will create a constructor
 52      * for user defined interface, which can be initialized and bounded 
 53      * to the target object which implements the interface functionality.
 54      * @class 
 55      * @name py.Interface
 56      * @example
 57      * //create interface definition
 58      * py.Interface('ISaveable',{
 59      *     save:function(){},
 60      *     load:function(){}
 61      * },'pckg');
 62      * 
 63      * //create class
 64      * py.Class('Model', { Implements: pckg.ISaveable,
 65      *     save: function(){
 66      *          //implement save code (if interface function odes not
 67      *          //exists Class definer will throw an error
 68      *     },
 69      *     load: function(){
 70      *          //implement load code
 71      *     },
 72      *     parse: function(){},
 73      *     set: function(){}
 74      * },'pckg')
 75      * 
 76      * var MyModel = new pckg.Model();
 77      * //bnd interface to the Class's instance
 78      * var IMyModel = new pckg.ISaveable(MyModel);
 79      * 
 80      * //You will notice here that IMyModel contains only
 81      * //save() and load() functions will same functions on instantiated object
 82      * 
 83      * 
 84      * @constructor
 85      * 
 86      * @param {Object} name
 87      * @param {Object} definition
 88      * @param {Object | String} pckg
 89      * 
 90      * @returns {Function} constructor for the defined interface
 91      */
 92     function Interface(name, definition, pckg){
 93     
 94         function Construct(objectInstance){
 95             if(objectInstance && isObject(objectInstance)){
 96                 bind.call(this, objectInstance, definition);
 97             }else{
 98                 throw 'an object for interface binding should be defined';
 99             }
100         }
101         
102         Construct.className = name;
103         
104         Class.prototype.validateInput(name, definition, pckg);
105         
106         Construct.bind = function(objectInstance){
107             return new Construct(objectInstance);
108         };
109         
110         Class.prototype.mixinProto(Construct.prototype, definition);
111 		Class.prototype.applyToPackage(pckg, Construct);
112 		
113         return Construct;
114     }
115     
116     Interface.prototype = {
117         bind: bind
118     };
119     
120     $NS.Interface = Interface;
121     
122 }(py, this));
